long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Leksis is a simple, fast, and efficient browser extension that allows you to count the words and characters of any selected text on a webpage.

By right-clicking on highlighted text and selecting "Count Words and Characters", you can quickly view the total word and character count in a clean pop-up.

Whether you're working online or offline, Leksis provides a lightweight solution for quick text analysis with minimal permissions required.
